mapper.update:
UPDATE ADMIN.MOZZLE SET MOZZLE_NAME=#{mozzle_name}, MOZZLE_INTRO=#{mozzle_intro},
IMAGE_ORIGIN=#{image_origin},
IMAGE_SAVED=#{image_saved},
STATE=#{state} WHERE MOZZLE_ID= #{mozzle_id}
mapper.select: SELECT MOZZLE_ID, MOZZLE_NAME, MOZZLE_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_ORIGIN, IMAGE_SAVED, STATE, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), COUNT(*) MEMBERCNT FROM (SELECT m.MOZZLE_ID MOZZLE_ID, m.MOZZLE_NAME MOZZLE_NAME, m.MOZZLE_INTRO MOZZLE_INTRO, m.CREATE_DATE CREATE_DATE, m.IMAGE_ORIGIN IMAGE_ORIGIN, m.IMAGE_SAVED IMAGE_SAVED, m.STATE STATE FROM MOZZLE m RIGHT JOIN USER_MOZZLE um ON m.MOZZLE_ID = um.MOZZLE_ID WHERE um.AUTH_CODE IN ('1', '2')) WHERE MOZZLE_ID = #{mozzle_id} GROUP BY MOZZLE_ID, MOZZLE_NAME, MOZZLE_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_ORIGIN, IMAGE_SAVED, STATE, CREATE_DATE

SELECT m.MOZZLE_ID MOZZLE_ID, m.MOZZLE_NAME MOZZLE_NAME, m.MOZZLE_INTRO MOZZLE_INTRO, m.CREATE_DATE CREATE_DATE, m.IMAGE_ORIGIN IMAGE_ORIGIN, m.IMAGE_SAVED IMAGE_SAVED, m.STATE STATE, um.NICKNAME LEADER_NICKNAME FROM MOZZLE m LEFT JOIN USER_MOZZLE um ON m.MOZZLE_ID = um.MOZZLE_ID WHERE um.AUTH_CODE = '1' AND um.USER_ID = #{user_id}

SELECT m.MOZZLE_ID MOZZLE_ID, m.MOZZLE_NAME MOZZLE_NAME, m.MOZZLE_INTRO MOZZLE_INTRO, m.CREATE_DATE CREATE_DATE, m.IMAGE_ORIGIN IMAGE_ORIGIN, m.IMAGE_SAVED IMAGE_SAVED, m.STATE STATE, um.NICKNAME LEADER_NICKNAME FROM MOZZLE m LEFT JOIN USER_MOZZLE um ON m.MOZZLE_ID = um.MOZZLE_ID WHERE m.STATE = 'Y' AND um.AUTH_CODE = '1' ORDER BY m.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT MOZZLE_ID, MOZZLE_NAME, MOZZLE_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_ORIGIN, IMAGE_SAVED, STATE, COUNT(*) MEMBERCNT FROM (SELECT m.MOZZLE_ID MOZZLE_ID, m.MOZZLE_NAME MOZZLE_NAME, m.MOZZLE_INTRO MOZZLE_INTRO, m.CREATE_DATE CREATE_DATE, m.IMAGE_ORIGIN IMAGE_ORIGIN, m.IMAGE_SAVED IMAGE_SAVED, m.STATE STATE FROM MOZZLE m RIGHT JOIN USER_MOZZLE um ON m.MOZZLE_ID = um.MOZZLE_ID WHERE um.AUTH_CODE IN ('1', '2')) GROUP BY MOZZLE_ID, MOZZLE_NAME, MOZZLE_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_ORIGIN, IMAGE_SAVED, STATE ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM USER_MOZZLE WHERE AUTH_CODE IN ('1', '2')) WHERE MOZZLE_ID = #{mozzle_id} GROUP BY MOZZLE_ID
SELECT NICKNAME AS LEADER_NICKNAME FROM USER_MOZZLE WHERE MOZZLE_ID=#{mozzle_id} AND AUTH_CODE ='1'

SELECT MOZZLE_ID , MOZZLE_NAME, MOZZLE_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_ORIGIN, IMAGE_SAVED FROM (SELECT MOZZLE_ID , MOZZLE_NAME, MOZZLE_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_ORIGIN, IMAGE_SAVED FROM MOZZLE m WHERE STATE = 'Y' AND MOZZLE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' UNION ALL SELECT MOZZLE_ID , MOZZLE_NAME, MOZZLE_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_ORIGIN, IMAGE_SAVED FROM MOZZLE m WHERE STATE = 'Y' AND MOZZLE_INTRO LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' UNION ALL SELECT m.MOZZLE_ID, m.MOZZLE_NAME, m.MOZZLE_INTRO, m.CREATE_DATE, m.IMAGE_ORIGIN, m.IMAGE_SAVED FROM MOZZLE m JOIN MOZZLE_CATEGORY mc ON m.MOZZLE_ID = mc.MOZZLE_ID JOIN CATEGORY c ON mc.CATEGORY_CODE = c.CATEGORY_CODE WHERE m.STATE = 'Y' AND c.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') GROUP BY MOZZLE_ID, MOZZLE_NAME, MOZZLE_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_ORIGIN, IMAGE_SAVED ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT DISTINCT (m.MOZZLE_ID), m.MOZZLE_NAME, m.MOZZLE_INTRO, m.CREATE_DATE, m.IMAGE_ORIGIN, m.IMAGE_SAVED FROM MOZZLE m FULL OUTER JOIN MOZZLE_CATEGORY mc ON m.MOZZLE_ID = mc.MOZZLE_ID FULL OUTER JOIN CATEGORY c ON mc.CATEGORY_CODE = c.CATEGORY_CODE WHERE (m.MOZZLE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR m.MOZZLE_INTRO LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR c.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') AND m.STATE = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT CATEGORY_CODE FROM CATEGORY GROUP BY CATEGORY_CODE ORDER BY COUNT(*)
